HOME.TITLE: TensorBlock
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Building a diverse, active open-source LLM community to drive AI innovation.
HOME.TAGLINE: AI for All. Accessible. Open. Fair.

VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
VISION.DESCRIPTION: Our vision is to enable a new era of intelligent agents by making AI infrastructure open, composable, and accessible to all.
VISION.DETAILED: We believe the future of AI lies not in monolithic models, but in dynamic networks of autonomous agents — systems that can perceive, reason, and act across diverse environments. To unlock this future, the foundational infrastructure must be democratized: modular, interoperable, and easy to adopt. We're building toward a world where anyone — from individual developers to global communities — can participate in the creation and evolution of intelligent agents.

FORGE.TITLE: Forge is your unified gateway to the AI world.
FORGE.DESCRIPTION: With one secure key, access and orchestrate models across providers — with intelligent routing, enterprise-grade encryption, automated failover, and real-time cost control. Built for speed, scale, and seamless integration.

STUDIO.TITLE: TensorBlock Studio is a lightweight, developer-friendly AI workspace built for clarity, control, and creativity.
STUDIO.DESCRIPTION: With one secure key, access and orchestrate models across providers — with intelligent routing, enterprise-grade encryption, automated failover, and real-time cost control. Built for speed, scale, and seamless integration.

MCP_HUB.TITLE: MCP Hub is your gateway to the Model Context Protocol ecosystem.
MCP_HUB.DESCRIPTION: It offers a curated set of MCP servers, deployable in the cloud with secure, efficient, and multi-tenant support. MCP Hub intelligently routes requests to the most suitable server based on your needs — enabling scalable, reliable, and optimized AI service delivery.

LAYERED_APPROACH.STUDIO: UX layer for Users and Agents

FORGE.MASTER_KEY: Your Master Key to the TensorBlock AI Universe
FORGE.DESCRIPTION: Forge removes the friction of multi-provider AI and fragmented tooling, giving you one ultra-secure, high-performance command center to orchestrate everything — from models to services to infrastructure.
FORGE.UNLOCK_POWER: Unlock the full power of AI with Forge.

FEATURES.CENTRALIZED_ACCESS: Centralized access across all models and providers

LIGHTNING_FAST.TITLE: Lightning-Fast AI Calls
LIGHTNING_FAST.DESC: Powered by Forge's Dynamic Velocity Engine, with predictive caching and stream-level orchestration

SCALABLE.TITLE: Scalable by Design
SCALABLE.DESC: Handle anything from lightweight interactions to massive agent workloads with near-zero latency

BANK_GRADE.TITLE: Bank-Grade Encryption
BANK_GRADE.DESC: for all your provider keys and credentials

SMART_ROUTING.DESC: Send tasks to the best provider based on cost, performance, or capability

FALLBACKS.TITLE: Automated Fallbacks
FALLBACKS.DESC: Never miss a request — reroute instantly during outages or slowness

MONITORING.TITLE: Live Cost Monitoring

TENSORBLOCK.TITLE: TensorBlock-Ready
TENSORBLOCK.DESC: Instantly unlock and orchestrate all TensorBlock services

EXTRA.PASSPORT: Your Passport to the TensorBlock Ecosystem
EXTRA.KEY_DESC_1: Your Forge Key is more than just an API credential
EXTRA.KEY_DESC_2: — it's your secure gateway to everything TensorBlock:
EXTRA.SUMMARY: Forge is your central hub to control, scale, and supercharge your AI stack — securely and intelligently.
EXTRA.MOTTO: Conquer complexity. Control your stack. Accelerate innovation.

BONUS.TITLE: Bonus
BONUS.DESC: With your Forge Key, unlock exclusive early access to cutting-edge models running on TensorBlock Nodes—models you won't find anywhere else in the market.
